Record.BroaderTerm: Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities
Non-Neoplastic Connective and Soft Tissue Disorder
Record.Description: Hereditary metabolic disorder characterized by recurrent acute arthritis, hyperuricemia and deposition of sodium urate in and around the joints, sometimes with formation of uric acid calculi.
